doc:
Anders Hove (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anders_Hove_(actor) 0 Anders Hove (born 16 January 1956) is an actor and director from Greenland. Hove is best known for his role of the vampire Radu Vladislas in the four Subspecies-movies, Cesar Faison in ABC's General Hospital, Loving, Port Charles and in the film In the Middle of the Night as Nalle. Anders_Hove ( born_16_January_1956 ) is an_actor_and_director from Greenland . Hove is_best_known for his_role of the_vampire_Radu_Vladislas in the_four_Subspecies-movies , Cesar_Faison in ABC 's_General_Hospital , Loving , Port_Charles and in the_film In the_Middle of the_Night as Nalle .
